name: Css-way
body:
# css-way

css组件学习之路

###目录结构
* docs                存放相关技术细节文档
* collections         存放一些搜集整理的粗略代码,目的是提供一种简单的参考
* sass                sass 文件目录
* components          存放公共组件
* samples             组件例子

### 组件(Components)

* [按钮(Button)](dist/samples/button.html)
* [图标(Icon)](dist/samples/icon-font.html)
    - [icomoon图标列表](dist/samples/icon-icomoon.html)
* [输入框(Input)](dist/samples/input.html)
* [表格(Table)](dist/samples/table.html)
* [分组(Group)](dist/samples/group.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
